name.str: pair of magical armored stone gauntlets
name.str_pl: pairs of magical armored stone gauntlets

description: A magical flexible stonelike substance for protection and attack.

name: finger firelighter
description: This is a small flame you can hold in your hand.  With a thought, you can cause it to light something on fire, or you can throw it to ignite something flammable.

name: stable spark
description: Small electric spark, that does not disappear under your force.  With a thought, you can cause it to light something on fire, or you can throw it to ignite something flammable.

name: magic lamp
description: A magical light source that will light up a small area.

name: magic light
description: A small magical light that you can read by.
A lightweight but tough shield crafted entirely of magical ice.
A magical slick icy coating on your feet.  While quite fast on flat floors, they make it difficult to move on rough terrain.
A crackling magical warhammer full of lightning to smite your foes with, and of course, to smash things to bits!
Encases your arm and hand in a sheath of crackling magical lightning, you can punch and defend yourself with it in melee combat.

name: vicious tentacle whip
description: A long, writhing, tentacle covered in sharp bonelike blades and spikey protrusions.

name: flarewhip
description: A long whip made of blue-hot magical flames.  The heat is horrendous when touching an enemy.
A large pouch of tough flesh on your back, filled with tiny tentacles that grasp and hold anything you place inside.  It shifts and adjusts itself to minimize encumbrance.
This is a wicked spear/halberd hybrid entirely created of bone.

//: Not using copy-from 'reflexbow', since wearability causes druid bow not to be wielded, and ammo / clip type causes it to require real arrows
description: A magically conjured ornate recurve bow of solid flexible wood.  A matching conjured wooden arrow appears when you draw the string back for firing.
A magically conjured quiver, marvelously light and easy to wear despite the arrows it holds.
A magically conjured quiver, marvelously light and easy to wear despite the arrows it holds.  This is an enhanced version, created by your increased mastery of the spell.
A magically conjured arrow made of twisted wood.
A arrow that looks more like it was grown than carved.  Despite that, it flies straight and true.  It explodes into a mass of entangling vegetation when it hits its target.

use_action.msg: You squeeze the seed in your palm, and it begins to turn to a fine dust.

description: A magical seed that can be squeezed to release purifying dust, which can then be used to purify up to a gallon of water.
This handful of fine dust glows with a growing intensity.
A magical powder that can be scattered on growing crops to make them grow faster.
A thin layer of magical ice, covering the entire body.  It doesn't provide much armor, instead dealing significant damage to enemies that try to attack you.
A thin layer of shifting, almost fluid living rock, covering the entire body.
Ouch, this really smarts!  It'll go away soon, maybe?
An all-encompassing, invisible layer of magical aura that protects you from the environment.

name: feral aura
//: Needs to remain an item instead of an effect until enchantment mutations from effects are fixed.
description: The manifestation of your rage.  It won't disappear until you calm down.

name: enhanced feral aura
//: Needs to remain an item instead of an effect until enchantment mutations from effects are fixed.
description: The manifestation of your rage.  It won't disappear until you calm down.
This wooden sword is ablaze!  It seems to be safe-ish to hold, but will burn up soon.
A pulsating club made of bone, stained with an ever-moving blood coating eager to absorb the living.
A leather sling, quivering with energy when in your palm to the point of almost tearing.  A pebble appears when you begin spinning it.

name: acid aura
description: An aura of thin acid, swirling around your body ready to corrode when struck or while striking.

name: werewolf aura
description: You have become the werewolf.  Boys becoming men, men becoming wolves.

name: Black Dragon Shell
description: An aura of black and green draconic energy, swirling around your body protecting you and punishing those who strike you.
Claws made from ice, able to freeze on contact while mauling foes.  You, however, feel only a slight chill on your hands.
A summoned magic armor.  It gets shinier and sturdier with each spell level and is affected by your intelligence.
A three-liter container made out of transparent force.  Can be used to store liquids.
This is a summoned mana sword, between the lighter arming sword and later two-handed swords in size.  It glows shiny, and its edge is sharper the more spell level and intelligence you have.
A sturdy shell that wraps your body, granting a sturdy defense.
A small, capsule-shaped field containing a stable portal to the sun.  You can feel solar energy radiating from it, and it saturates your body.

use_action.msg: You cover the pocket sun, and now the gap doesn't emit light.

description: A small, capsule-shaped field containing a stable portal to the sun.  It is currently covered.

use_action.msg: You remove the cover on the pocket sun, and now the gap emits light again.

description: A small ethereal pocket located under your left arm.  You can store your potions here, but it seems it has no real limitations.
A thin and flat knife made for throwing.  Its ineffective cutting edge and odd shape make it unsuitable for use as a tool.
A thin and flat knife made for throwing, wrapped in ethereal flames.  Its ineffective cutting edge and odd shape make it unsuitable for use as a tool.
A thin and flat knife made for throwing, emanating frigid cold.  Its ineffective cutting edge and odd shape make it unsuitable for use as a tool.
A thin and flat knife with wide edge made for throwing, seems unnaturally sharp.  Its ineffective cutting edge and odd shape make it unsuitable for use as a tool.
A thin and flat knife made for throwing, made of porous substance and covered in dark ooze.  Its ineffective cutting edge and odd shape make it unsuitable for use as a tool.
A transparent blade that seems to radiate intent to be thrown.  Its ineffective cutting edge and odd shape make it unsuitable for use as a tool.
Shaped with your own magic, this tool has the same abilities as the common hammer.

use_action.msg: Your hammer transforms into a pickaxe!

description: Shaped with your own magic, this tool has the same abilities as the common pickaxe.

use_action.msg: Your pickaxe transforms into an ax!

description: Shaped with your own magic, this tool has the same abilities as the common axe.

use_action.msg: Your ax transforms into a knife!

description: Shaped with your own magic, this tool has the same abilities as the common knife.

use_action.msg: Your knife transforms into a shovel!

description: Shaped with your own magic, this tool has the same abilities as the common shovel.

use_action.msg: Your shovel transforms into a hammer!

description: Now you can breath under water, like a fish.
These two tiny shields on your temples should protect your mind from outside influences
The tiny shields all over your body should protect your mind from outside influences and your body from being moved by outside magic
Some free-floating elastic potential energy.
A mixture of bark, moss, and leaves, glowing softly with verdant energy.
A magically-summoned aetherspeaker, capable of communicating long-distance with other aetherspeakers or conventional radios.  With a command word, it may instead scan for radio signals.
An aetherspeaker tuned to listen for radio signals from the surrounding area.  With a command word, it may change frequency or switch to communicating with other aetherspeakers or radios.
A smoothly-curved conglomeration of mana, humming softly as it provides power.
//: Recharge time is 2 seconds due to bug #48019, making it actually 1 second. Reduce to 1 second if that ever gets fixed.

description: A smoothly-curved conglomeration of mana, humming softly as it provides power.
//: Recharge time is 2 seconds due to bug #48019, making it actually 1 second. Reduce to 1 second if that ever gets fixed.

description: A smoothly-curved conglomeration of mana, humming softly as it provides power.
//: Recharge time is 2 seconds due to bug #48019, making it actually 1 second. Reduce to 1 second if that ever gets fixed.

description: A smoothly-curved conglomeration of mana, humming softly as it provides power.
//: Recharge time is 2 seconds due to bug #48019, making it actually 1 second. Reduce to 1 second if that ever gets fixed.

description: A smoothly-curved conglomeration of mana, humming softly as it provides power.
//: Recharge time is 2 seconds due to bug #48019, making it actually 1 second. Reduce to 1 second if that ever gets fixed.

description: A smoothly-curved conglomeration of mana, humming softly as it provides power.
//: Recharge time is 2 seconds due to bug #48019, making it actually 1 second. Reduce to 1 second if that ever gets fixed.

description: Your hands can spark with electricity powerful enough to heat metal to searing temperatures and weld it together.  You can also zap the undead with it.
A twisted wooden spear whose branches twine together into a vicious point sticky with sap.

//: 'Tornskin' but working right.  Values copied from the Bark mutation.
name: Thornskin
description: Your skin is bark-like and covered in thorns.
Your fingers are a series of knives made of bone and flesh.  Enemies beware.

name: Aquatic Mantle
description: Covered in magical seaweed, you can travel and breathe underwater as long as this spell is in effect.

name: Waterstrider's Walk
description: You can easily walk on the surface of the water.

name: earthshaper map
description: This is a magical map that, if everything works correctly, you'll never actually see.

name: earthshaper map
description: This is a magical map that, if everything works correctly, you'll never actually see.

name: earthshaper map
description: This is a magical map that, if everything works correctly, you'll never actually see.

name: earthshaper map
description: This is a magical map that, if everything works correctly, you'll never actually see.

name: earthshaper map
description: This is a magical map that, if everything works correctly, you'll never actually see.

name: earthshaper map
description: This is a magical map that, if everything works correctly, you'll never actually see.
A magical disinfectant.  You should never actually see this.
A large, hollow sphere of ice.  Food placed inside will not rot.

name: Rime-Frozen Heart
description: You don't feel anything.

name: bearmantle
description: Think as the bear.  Move as the bear.  Sleep as the bear.
A bone from some creature or other, inhabited by benevolent spirits.
This lens has been etched with small symbols and infused with mana.  Holding it up to your eye allows you to see further than any mundane binoculars allow.
